query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, excerpt, content, featuredImage, category, isPublished, publishedAt) VALUES
('The Complete Guide to Shot Blasting Structural Steel: Preparation for Long-Term Protection',
 'shot-blasting-structural-steel-guide',
 'Discover why shot blasting is the gold-standard surface preparation method for structural steel, delivering the clean, profiled surface essential for maximum coating adhesion and long-term protection.',
 'Shot blasting content placeholder',
 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541888946425-d81bb19240f5?w=1200',
 'Technical Guides',
 1,
 NOW()),
('Shot Blasting and Powder Coating: The Perfect Partnership for Durable Metal Finishes',
 'shot-blasting-powder-coating-partnership',
 'Learn how the combination of shot blasting and powder coating creates finishing systems that offer exceptional durability, aesthetic appeal, and long-term value for metal components.',
 'Powder coating content placeholder',
 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565043589221-1a6fd9ae45c7?w=1200',
 'Surface Finishing',
 1,
 NOW()),
('Restoring Factory and Warehouse Cladding: Why Shot Blasting is Essential for Successful Refurbishment',
 'factory-warehouse-cladding-restoration',
 'Explore why shot blasting has become the definitive solution for preparing cladding panels, delivering thorough contamination removal and surface profiling essential for long-term restoration results.',
 'Cladding restoration content placeholder',
 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581094794329-c8112a89af12?w=1200',
 'Restoration Projects',
 1,
 NOW());
